section.title: DropUnreached Enumeration
section.para: The DropUnreached component syntactically unreachable code. It's fairly simple to handle if we make some space for creative interpretations of our stimuli stream. In this case, we assume that the stream continues on its merry way except when we encounter a function body, and in that case, our stream starts. We assume an independent stream for each function body, and rely on our architecture to handle extracting and saving those streams.
